title: Hideo Kojima has officially parted ways with Konami after nearly three decades
text:
Hideo Kojima has officially parted ways with Konami after nearly three decades 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
In a new report, Hideo Kojima has officially parted ways with Konami. After nearly three decades, Kojima will lay dormant until December of ...
